default_asserted_identity.description: When set to true, the asserted identity will have defaults and force the use of P-Asserted-Identity (instead of RPID) on all outbound offnet calls.  When set to false, P-Asserted-Identity is only used if explicitly set in the account/user/device hierarchy.

default_emit_account_id.description: When set to true, all outbound offnet calls will include a SIP header X-Account-ID with a value of the Kazoo account UUID.
